panels.title: Block execution time [p50]
panels.description: p50, p95 and p99 of the time spent to execute a block

targets.expr: histogram_quantile(0.50, sum(rate(aptos_executor_execute_block_seconds_bucket{chain_name=~"$chain_name", namespace=~"$namespace", kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name", role=~"$role"}[$interval])) by (kubernetes_pod_name, role, le))

panels.title: Block execution time [p90]
panels.description: p50, p95 and p99 of the time spent to execute a block

targets.expr: histogram_quantile(0.90, sum(rate(aptos_executor_execute_block_seconds_bucket{chain_name=~"$chain_name", namespace=~"$namespace", kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name", role=~"$role"}[$interval])) by (kubernetes_pod_name, role, le))

panels.title: Block execution time [p99]
panels.description: p50, p95 and p99 of the time spent to execute a block

targets.expr: histogram_quantile(0.99, sum(rate(aptos_executor_execute_block_seconds_bucket{chain_name=~"$chain_name", namespace=~"$namespace", kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name", role=~"$role"}[$interval])) by (kubernetes_pod_name, role, le))

panels.description: p50, p95 and p99 of the time spent for persisting execution result to storage when committing blocks

panels.description: p50, p95 and p99 of the time spent for persisting execution result to storage when committing blocks

panels.title: Time spent in storage to save transactions [p99]
panels.description: p50, p95 and p99 of the time spent for persisting execution result to storage when committing blocks

panels.title: Avg Block execution time
panels.description: The average time spent to execute a block

panels.title: Avg  VM execute block time
panels.description: The average time spent to execute a block in VM

panels.title: Avg  Total time to commit blocks
panels.description: The average time spent to commit blocks

panels.title: Avg  Time spent in storage to save transactions
panels.description: The average time spent for persisting execution result to storage when committing blocks

panels.title: Avg Execute and commit chunk time
panels.description: The average time spent for executing and committing each chunk in state-syncing

panels.title: Executor Error Counter
panels.description: The counter that indicates the number of errors reported.
